summary: Frontend testing completed for Hero Editor CTA3 and CTA4 premium buttons. All requested features verified working: CTA3 (Bouton Premium 1) and CTA4 (Bouton Premium 2) appear in the 'Boutons d'action' section with golden star icons and amber border styling. Both buttons can be enabled, configured with text/link/icon/style/colors, and display correctly on the homepage when activated. Hover effect dropdown (scale, glow, shake) is functional.

issues: Hero background image shows 'Hero background' alt text - image may not be loading properly (pre-existing issue from iteration 6)

Admin login works with provided credentials (contact@worldautofrance.com / Admin123!)

critical_code_review_comments: HeroEditor.jsx correctly implements CTA3 and CTA4 sections (lines 635-877) with proper styling and configuration options
Premium buttons have distinctive amber border styling (border-2 border-amber-500/30 bg-amber-500/5) for visual differentiation
Home.jsx correctly renders CTA3 (lines 669-687) and CTA4 (lines 689-707) with hover effects and custom styling
Hover effects properly implemented: scale (hover:scale-105), glow (hover:shadow-lg hover:shadow-amber-500/50 or purple-500/50), shake (hover:animate-pulse)
Border radius options correctly mapped in Home.jsx for both CTA3 and CTA4
seed_data_creation: Created test data: CTA3 text='Test Premium Button 1', CTA4 text='Test Premium Button 2'
context_for_next_testing_agent: CTA3 and CTA4 premium buttons fully tested and working. Both buttons appear in Hero Editor under 'Boutons d'action' section with golden star icons and amber border. Configuration includes: icon, text, link, style, size, border radius, colors (background, text, border), and hover effects (none, scale, glow, shake). Buttons display correctly on homepage when enabled. Admin credentials: contact@worldautofrance.com / Admin123!. Note: Hero background image has pre-existing loading issue (shows alt text).
